LanguageData.FullMetalJacket.label: цільнометалева оболонка
LanguageData.FullMetalJacket.description: The soft lead core is encased in a harder metal coating, combining a medium amount of stopping power and armor penetration.
LanguageData.ArmorPiercing.label: бронебійний
LanguageData.ArmorPiercing.description: Features a hardened steel penetrator core for increased armor penetration.
LanguageData.HollowPoint.label: експансивний
LanguageData.HollowPoint.description: A hollowed out tip causes the bullet to expand on impact, increasing tissue damage at the cost of armor penetration.
LanguageData.Sabot.label: бронебійно-підкаліберний
LanguageData.Sabot.description: Uses a discarding sabot to fire an undersized projectile at higher muzzle velocities, greatly improving armor penetration.
LanguageData.IncendiaryAP.label: бронебійно-запальний
LanguageData.IncendiaryAP.description: Filled with an incendiary compound that ignites on impact, doing additional damage and increasing armor penetration.
LanguageData.ExplosiveAP.label: бронебійно-фугасний
LanguageData.ExplosiveAP.description: Filled with high-explosives that detonate on impact for additional damage.
LanguageData.TranqNonLethal.label: транквілізатор
LanguageData.TranqNonLethal.description: Special round designed for non-lethal engagements of targets. Filled with fast-acting sedatives and tipped with a hypodermic needle.
LanguageData.RubberBullet.label: гумова куля
LanguageData.RubberBullet.description: Special round designed for non-lethal engagements of targets, intended to inflict painful but non-fatal injuries.
LanguageData.Taser.label: електрошокер
LanguageData.Taser.description: Special round designed for non-lethal engagements of targets, delivering an incapacitating electrical current.
LanguageData.Flare.label: освітлювальний
LanguageData.Flare.description: Special round based around a brightly-burning incendiary element, used for signaling and illumination.
LanguageData.Demolition.label: руйнівний
LanguageData.Demolition.description: Special round based around a low explosive element, used to destroy structures and fortifications.
